scripts.build: pnpm recursive --filter '!@xai-vanguard-node/vanguard-client-desktop' run build && pnpm -r -filter  @xai-vanguard-node/vanguard-client-desktop run build
scripts.cli: pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/vanguard-node-cli run compile && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/vanguard-node-cli run start
scripts.desktop: pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/web-connect run build && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/vanguard-client-desktop run dev
scripts.web: pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/web-connect run dev
scripts.deploy-smart-contracts: pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/core run build && pnpm -r -filter @xai-vanguard-node/smart-contracts run deploy
